[" Earth Spike is now blocked by  Linken's Sphere.", 'Reduced  Hex duration from 1/2/3/4 to 1.25/2/2.75/3.5.']

['Fixed  Earth Spike affecting Juggernaut during  Blade Fury.', 'Fixed a bug between  Voodoo Restoration and Earth Spike.']

['No longer turns hit enemies invulnerable during the air time.', 'No longer causes hit enemy units to instantly face towards Lion.', 'No longer requires channeling in order for the spikes to reach max distance.', 'No longer conflicts with  Burrowstrike,  Impale,  Ravage and Earth Spike from other Lions.', 'No longer fails to stun and damage enemies when the targeted point was a cliff.', 'Recoded  Earth Spike:
No longer turns hit enemies invulnerable during the air time.
No longer causes hit enemy units to instantly face towards Lion.
No longer requires channeling in order for the spikes to reach max distance.
No longer conflicts with  Burrowstrike,  Impale,  Ravage and Earth Spike from other Lions.
No longer fails to stun and damage enemies when the targeted point was a cliff.']
